source: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_SEQ_00<tab>Aimebert is in need of an adventurer to do his fighting for him.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_SEQ_00<tab>テイルフェザー周辺キャンプのエムベルは、戦える者を探しているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_SEQ_01<tab>Bandersnatches have been making easy meals of trapped chocobos. Aimebert bids you slay three of these opportunistic predators.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_SEQ_01<tab>エムベルに<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20DED01 /var>の討伐を頼まれた。高地ドラヴァニアのチョコボの森で、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20DED01 /var>」を3体討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_SEQ_02<tab>The bandersnatches are no longer a threat to the trapped chocobos. Inform Aimebert that his trapped birds are now safe.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20DED01 /var>を討伐した。テイルフェザー周辺キャンプの「エムベル」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_SEQ_03<tab>Aimebert is pleased with the good news. He expresses regret that chocobos in his traps fell victim to hungry predators, and is grateful that no more birds will meet such grisly fates on his account.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_SEQ_03<tab>エムベルに報告した。肉食獣との絶え間なき生存競争が、ここのチョコボたちを強く、逞しく育て上げているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_000<tab>Godsdammit─that's the third time this week! Blasted bandersnatches keep snappin' up the chocobos afore we collect 'em from the traps.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_000むむむ……ここ数日で、もう3回目か……。
いや、罠に掛かったままのチョコボが喰われていたのだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_001<tab>The blasted beasts got a taste of chocobo meat, an' now they won't stay away!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_001犯人は、だ。
奴らめ、罠に捕らわれ抵抗できないチョコボを、
食い殺す旨みを覚えてしまったようだな……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_002<tab>Why, I seen three prowlin' nearby not a bell ago, waitin' for an easy meal. If you were to get rid of them, might be as I'll make it worth your while.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_002冒険者よ、「」狩りを頼めんか？
3体ほど倒せば、この辺りが危険だと思い知ることだろう。
危険な野獣だが、よろしく頼むぞ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_010<tab>The natural predators 'round these parts make our chocobos more fierce than any other region's, which is why it's a shame to lose even one. Hurry an' slay those bandersnatches before they make a meal outta any more birds.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_010冒険者よ、「」狩りを頼めんか？
3体ほど倒せば、この辺りが危険だと思い知ることだろう。
危険な野獣だが、よろしく頼むぞ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_020<tab>...You slew the beasts? Wonderful! Now the chocobos won't become bandersnatch fodder no more!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_020やってきてくれたか、助かった。
これで少しは、も大人しくなるだろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_021<tab>To be fair, though, the birds're perfectly capable of fendin' for themselves. They only fell prey to the bandersnatches 'cause they were trapped. For that, I feel bloody awful...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_021しかし、罠に捕らわれた獲物を狙うとは、奴らも考えたな。
チョコボは圧倒的な脚力で「チョコキック」を放ち、
肉食獣を撃退することもあるからな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_022<tab>But thanks to you, the noble creatures won't meet such an unfittin' end no more.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ205_01774_AIMEBERT_000_022逆に言えば、肉食獣との絶え間なき生存競争が、
チョコボたちを強く、逞しく育て上げているともいえる。
それだけに、ここのチョコボには価値があるのさ。
